Name: Bootstrap ACLs
Info Revealed with No Token: Full management token on first call; 403 error after first call

Name: Translate a Legacy Token's Rules
Additional Notes: Should be removed when legacy ACLs removed

Name: Getting the Consul License
Info Revealed with No Token: license timing, package/feature availability, license and customer id

Name: Login to Auth Method
Info Revealed with No Token: Returns all token info if bearer token known

Name: Logout from Auth Method
Info Revealed with No Token: No return value (deletes a token if the bearer token is known)

Name: List All Namespaces
Additional Notes: Access can be granted to list the Namespace if the token used when making the request has been granted any access in the namespace (read, list or write).

Name: Read a Namespace
Additional Notes: Access can be granted to list the Namespace if the token used when making the request has been granted any access in the namespace (read, list or write).

Name: Update a Namespace
Equiv Command: consul namespace update consul namespace write

Name: List Raft Peers
Info Revealed with No Token: IP address + port of Raft members (servers)

Name: Read WAN Coordinates
Equiv Command: consul rtt -wan # to get data, doesn't perform calculation
Info Revealed with No Token: Consul datacenter names, server node names, and their network coordinates

Name: Read LAN Coordinates for All Nodes
Equiv Command: consul rtt # to get data, doesn't perform calculation

Name: Consul Watch
Additional Notes: Depends on what is being watched

Name: Check ACL Replication
Info Revealed with No Token: Whether replication is enabled and its status

Name: Translate Rules
Additional Notes: Should be removed when legacy ACLs removed

Name: OIDC Authorization URL Request
Info Revealed with No Token: Obtain an auth URL to start the OIDC login flow

Name: OIDC Callback
Additional Notes: Returns token in exchange for provided authorization code

Name: Read ACL Token (Legacy)
Info Revealed with No Token: Returns all token info if token UUID known

Name: Read Self Token
Info Revealed with No Token: Returns all token info if token secret ID known

Name: Get Local Service Health by ID
Retrieve Map of Services for a Node
List CA Root Certificates
Info Revealed with No Token: List of trusted CA (public) root certificates

Name: Read LAN Coordinates for a Node
Update LAN Coordinates for a Node
List Service Instances for Connect-enabled Service
List Service Instances for Ingress Gateways Associated with a Service
Execute Prepared Query
Additional Notes: If an ACL Token was bound to the query when it was defined then it will be used when executing the request. Otherwise, the client's supplied ACL Token will be used.

Name: Get Raft Leader
Info Revealed with No Token: IP address + port of Raft leader
Additional Notes: consul operator raft list-peers consul operator autopilot state ... Can both be used, but they require operator:read  https://www.consul.io/commands/operator/raft#list-peers

Name: Create Transaction
Additional Notes: Depends on the operations in the transaction
